issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://google.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com) ### Comment > Toda vez que preciso fazer uma pesquisa no google preciso preencher o captcha. E aponta a necessidade porque tenho serviço VPN. O único que uso é o AdGuard. Não quero usad outro buscador (nos outros buscadores não tenho problema, mas o alcance da pesquisa é bem inferior ao do google) Username: `jpcortina@gmail.com` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fdg5oyrwv6ogg8sw88kkgw48k40ckgwldxblcuez7k.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/7t9v94ftynsww8ks04s8skowg8kk0kcah1h1olmnls.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.5 System version: | IOS 18.0.1 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

When I click on images in search results, they don't expand unless I completely exit (the Chrome extension doesn't interfere even when it's enabled, however). > > Not pictured: the same holds true on normal search results. When I try to click on any of the drop down results (common questions, for example), nothing happens unless I fully exit AdGuard on Windows. Username: `@scampadversary` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/sue6kfxjb00sss0gcskwso8ooc044g042hh3qs5h7u.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qz9uvz84gqowwg48o0c40kwksgwg4cjaqggeyfyio0.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: subhd.tv
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Safari ### AdGuard version 1.11.19 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Safari ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://subhd.tv/a/572438 ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard Chinese filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Cannot finish CAPTCHA when downloading subtitles (only some subtitles need CAPTCHA). It shows "images failed loading." But when I using AdGuard for Mac instead of AdGuard for Safari, it works without any problem. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: subhd.tv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://subhd.tv/a/572438](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsubhd.tv%2Fa%2F572438) ### Comment > Cannot finish CAPTCHA when downloading subtitles (only some subtitles need CAPTCHA). It shows "images failed loading." But when I using AdGuard for Mac instead of AdGuard for Safari, it works without any problem. ### Screenshots
